name: Give Me All Your Love
description: A small MBF21 mapset with castle theme and some medium-to-hard combat. And lots of purple. But sadly without love... maybe you can give it?

name: Resurgence of the Storm
description: Resurgence of the Storm is a Starcraft 2 arcade map that is currently being developed by zeroLamberg inside the Starcraft 2 Galaxy Editor. It is designed as a successor/recreation for Heroes of the Storm. It launched with 15 playable heroes, most of which are redesigned versions of their Heroes counterparts.

name: Surmountable
description: Your ship is shot down while engaged in a space battle. You land on an unknown planet. With your battleship damaged and no way of contacting your mother ship, you must survive on the planet until you find a way back home.

name: Dungeon Adventure Island
description: A relaxed and casual 2D adventure game with the theme character of a bankrupt miner. A game that appears incredibly childish, with very simple controls that require simplicity, fun, and easy to get started.

name: Rockman 2024 New Year's Hack
description: A small hack to celebrate New Years 2024, Year of the Dragon.

name: On Christmas He Will Return Home
description:
An experimental visual novel about abusive relationships (with prophetic destiny.)

A woman awaits for her love to return on Christmas.

With every day, his return becomes more inevitable.

name: Dead Drop
description:
Dead Drop is the 19th game in the Carol Reed series.

The game is 100% mouse driven and features a classic adventure game interface.
There is absolutely no need to have played any of the previous games in the Carol Reed series to fully enjoy Dead Drop.

The game takes place is Sweden, but it is in English. All dialogues have subtitles.
The game contains no graphic violence or any swearing. It has no action elements, and is suitable for ages 15 and up.

name: Pok√©mon Cross Stadium
description:
This is a mod that updates some mechanics to new gens combining some of them with the first generation.
It has balanced rentals unlike the vanilla game and lots of features.

name: Dream Island: A Skyward Journey
description: Master tricky jumps, outwit prowling lions, and conquer a challenging world across two distinct islands!

name: Cranky Counter (Don't Play This Game!)
description:
We put out a new game for the Playdate, but seriously, you must have something more important you should be doing instead.

If you insist, you can download it and check it out. You turn the crank on the Playdate and a number goes up. That's pretty cool I guess...

name: A Technician's Nightmare
description: This is a multiplayer survival game in a haunted house. For 1-4 players The player must successfully complete the mission, during which there will be strange events occurring in the house. Their main objective is to survive and make it back safely.

name: XiJiang Shipyard
description: Create freely in the virtual world.

name: TVS Sample Box
description: Experimental Trash Vomit Studios Prequels, Prototypes & Mini-games collection.

name: Escape from Blackwood
description: From wanting to go visit a castle to being trapped inside it. Solve the clues and discover how to escape from it

name: Retropolis Dot.Line
description: Retropolis dot.Line is a mixed-reality game where you can solve puzzles and decorate your home.

name: Jump Penguin Final
description: This is the final chapter of the Jump Penguin series. This is a classic platformer game where you aim for the goal with simple controls. Touch the giant penguin in the sky. Missing a giant penguin? ‚Ä¶Hit the jump to find out.

name: Thanatophobia
description: Thanatophobia is a survival game in a horrific atmosphere, playable solo or in cooperation with a minimum of 2 players and a maximum of 4 players. Escape unscathed, don't get caught, there won't be a second chance.

name: The Legend of Ogorets 4: Warren
description: An immersive, barebones-style interactive visual novel with choices, lore, and endgames. Not for the faint of heart.

name: Extraordinary: Immortal
description: "Extraordinary: Immortal" tells a story of a 700-year time loop. Karena suddenly receives a mysterious letter, in which the sender informs her that there is one thing she must complete on her own, or else all the efforts to save the world from three years ago will become entirely meaningless...

name: VR Fitness: R18 DLC
description: Easy fitness in VR! Complete missions and hidden elements! Sexual exercise with a girl instructor!

name: Arcane Fighters
description: Arcane Fighters is 2D platform PvP where you can fight against your friends using magic, strategy and ... MAGIC! Choose from many unique spells and set up your build to outsmart opponents. Still early access so stay tuned!

name: The Fairway Club
description: Grab your clubs and get to The Fairway Club now! We offer a relaxing golfing experience for any type of golfer. Hit one of our courses or driving ranges, located all around the world, in the morning, evening or night!

name: Zamakan
description: Experience an alternative reality where ancient Egyptians have become a space travel civilization. Fly an Egyptian-themed space ship through an asteroid field, avoiding collisions with objects that bend the fabric of time-space. How far can you go in this endless runner game?

name: Famicom Zenkoku Issei Quiz
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Manoli: Aprendiz de Hechicera
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Posshexor
description:
For a century humanity has fought a bloody war against the evil forces of the Necronomicon Ex Mortis, the Book of the Dead, but now, miraculously, it has been captured and finally the war won...

...Until you read one of its pages and it all went back to hell. Nice one.
Now hexed with powers of possession, you must re-vanquish your path into the begotten depths of hell, cursing your soul with every step taken to once and for all, catch and destroy the Necronomicon Ex Mortis!

name: Buggotchi
description: In this game, you need to raise your own Frog, from egg to frog, feed them, watch them grow and play with them in a mini game. The bigger the frog becomes, as hungrier it gets. Try to beat your personal high score.

name: Bane of Oakenshade
description: Enter a dark world filled with mystery and evil. A brooding atmospheric first person dungeon crawler. Featuring multiple spells,weapons and armor. A vast amount of lore to indulge in if desired. Large maps encouraging exploration. 9 areas to explore featuring 10 dark ambient immersive soundtracks. Hours of game-play with rewarding character progression. An unfolding story to discover.

name: Last Rites 1347
description: 1347 - The Black Death ravages Europe. The End of the world draws near as The Pestilence brings about supernatural events. A man seeks comfort and forgiveness in his final hours. This game has some fantasy horror themes as well as some semi fictional religious themes.

name: Tape of the Ghouls 2
description: Are you ready for the sequel? Tape of the ghouls 2 is a VHS found footage survival horror. This video tape was found in May 1999 in the state of Louisiana. This tape reveals the events that unfolded in the decrepit hotel Starlight. The Starlight was demolished in October 1978. The content is beyond explanation. The recording was code-named Tape of the ghouls 2. Whoever you are. Whatever you know. Nothing in your experience could ever prepare you for of Tape of the ghouls 2. Get ready to watch.

name: Big Dengi
description: Big Dengi is a wild blend of visual novel and clicker. Originally it was supposed to be a part of Anti-Capitalistic Game Jam. Play as a faceless clerk in one of the worst corporations in the world. It's violent, unsafe, and unhinged. Will you keep your humanity or will you succumb to the merciless capitalistic machine? Unfortunately the question is rhetorical.

name: Planet Graveyard
description: Planet Graveyard is a short existential horror game based on a dream. It takes inspiration from LSD Dream Emulator and was originally created for the LSD Jam 2022. Explore bizarre and seemingly lifeless planet that looks like giant graveyard. Find out what actually happened to this world by interacting with different sights, scattered around. You are free to leave this planet whenever you want.

name: Undertide
description: You arrive by boat at a blinking tower, a body washes up in town. Talk to townsfolk and explore in this dreamlike mystery.

name: Sycamore
description: Sycamore is my submission for LSDJAM 2023, made in 5 days. It's a short top-down game with a surreal look. The goal is to find items hidden in the worlds you reach. The game is focused on exploration, so you'll have to interact with the level to find. There's a planets order, so keep this in mind. The game has two states: When you're in the planets and when you're in the spaceship. The spaceship controls quick, while the cowboy controls at a slower pace.

name: I Am a Worm
description: Oh, to be a worm, in a dream, trying to find an exit to get out. After all, can you imagine not having the arms for forks or spoons?! A short, worm-themed platformer.

name: Hypnorynth
description: You are pursued by a malevolent entity. You must enter the maze, meet its strange inhabitants, uncover its secrets and reach its center if you hope to make it out alive. Will you escape the Hypnorynth?

name: Portland 2024
description: FPS inspired by LSD Dream Simulator and Cruelty Squad. Fight your way through each level and explore till you find doorways with moving smiley faces.

name: The Dreamer
description: The Dreamer is a top down shooter where you, the player, engage in a psychedelic dream version of New York City. This game is short and contains two separate endings. See if you can complete them both. NPCs can help you with hints to that days quest. Created by Hunter Brown and Josie Coulter.

name: Dust and Echoes
description:
Dust and Echoes is a semi-open world fps that takes place in Oregon after doomsday. The game has 3 missions that can be completed in any order. After completing all 3, a new location will open on the map for the ending.

You can engage with NPCS and merchants to buy better gear and replenish health and ammo. Killing raiders will also allow you to sell their fingers for currency. "Dire coin" is the crypto currency of this world.

Underneath lies a story about accepting your face and learning to deal with the issues that surround you. Your life is what you make of it.

name: Career Fantasy
description: Career Fantasy is a turn-based JRPG that takes place in a college town in the modern American South. Choose a major, build a party, and save the world from the mysterious force that is seeking world domination!

name: Noisz Starlivht: True Heroes
description: A continuation to NOISZ STARLIVHT "False Timeline"'s story rather than a full fledged second game. True Heroes marks the end of the NOISZ saga.

name: Super Luigi Sunburn

name: Dragon Quest VIII: Journey of the Cursed King - Mobile Remaster
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Dragon Quest XI: Echoes of an Elusive Age S - Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: That time I got reincarnated as a fictional Defence Lawyer in an Ace Attorney fangame and had to defend myself against incredibly unfair odds.
description: Samallama goes on trial for not submitting an entry to the Red Truth comp, because it's impossible to make an entry in time.

name: The Best Text Adventure

name: Maria
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Dinomod Enhanced
description:
An update to the original Dinomod, Dinomod Enhanced is a continuation of the project, with new enhancements after added after the original project stopped being updated.

Dinomod Enhanced is the most up-to-date enhancement mod for Dinosaur Planet, and it is distributed standalone or via DinoLauncher.

name: Sacred Meat
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Sibel's Journey
description:
Approaching the subject of sexuality and gender in early adolescence can be scary, overwhelming, and often shameful. As a countermeasure, Sibel‚Äôs Journey taps into the potential of mobile games as a proven method for self-learning. The players interactively explore the content without having to ask an adult. As players‚Äô engagement with the game increases, their motivation and ability to remember the learning material improves.

The game follows 13-year-old Sibel, who meets interesting people during an exciting weekend in Berlin. She gets to know their different ways of living and loving, then finally discovers the secret of her best friend Sarah.

Adopting an intersectional approach, Sibel‚Äôs Journey provides young people with sound knowledge and a positive attitude about topics such as anatomy, body image, communication, contraception, gender identity and healthy relationships.

name: Kiwi Climber
description: Can a kiwi climb a mountain?

name: Raccooneering
description:
Build. Flail around wildly. Rebuild. Help Bj√∂rn the raccoon build the ultimate escape vehicle out of garbage.

*Raccooneering* was made in 5 days in Jaunpils Castle for Castle Game Jam 2023.

name: Mahjong
description: A mahjong solitaire game for the Vircon32.

name: Vitris
description: A tetris-clone style puzzle game for the Vircon32.

name: Cienie
description: Cienie is a mystery-thriller visual novel with supernatural elements set in the Polish town of Sypniewo. You follow Tomasz Tyszko, a law university dropout who now interns at a private investigation agency run by Markus Waldner. After five individuals are reported missing in the town, Tom tries to unravel the mystery behind the disappearances while navigating the complexities of relationships and adulthood.

name: Tiny Chao Garden DX
description:
Sonic Adventure and Sonic Adventure 2 had Chao Adventure. Sonic Adventure DX and Sonic Adventure 2: Battle had the Tiny Chao Garden. The Steam releases of those games have... nothing! That's where this project comes in. Designed to use the .chao format introduced by Fusion's Chao Editor and utilized by krzys2's Chao Exporter/Importer, this game allows you to interact with your Chao just like in the original Tiny Chao Garden!

More than just a simple recreation, Tiny Chao Garden DX has new enhancements and will feature more in the future! You can view a Chao's stats by opening the full menu, view item stats and descriptions in the shop and store your goods in a new inventory system.

name: Moth to a Matchstick
description: Ignite the past, one match at a time, and discover if love can withstand time as fleeting as the matches you light. Can you rekindle a love lost in the shadows before the flame fades away forever?

name: Hunter Hitman
description: Hunter Hitman is an action game where you play as a hitman armed with just a knife and your skills in the assassination. Sneak up on your enemies and eliminate them all. Kill multiple targets in a short time, and you will get a combo. Earn coins and unlock cards to obtain different character skins. Come back daily to collect daily rewards. Uncover loot boxes that yield cards. Assemble 3 of the same cards to upgrade your characters.

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Dread Samus
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Foodguessr
description: A 'guessr'-type game where you have to identify what country a given food is from.

name: The Cost Of Seeds
description: The price seeds is way too high! You are sick of it so you marching over to the seed factory and getting you fill

name: Cavern Adventurers
description: Build an underground network of caves in this fantasy-themed management sim.

name: Dottie Flowers
description: Dottie Flowers is a Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES) game created by the indie developer Goldlocke. This charming platformer was released as a physical cartridge for the SNES/Super Famicom, and the digital version released on the 1st March 2024.

name: Donkey Kong Accelerate
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Days Without
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: NarcotizeDR
description:
A short game made in RPGmaker MV, minus the RPG elements. Pronounced as Narcotized.

Investigate Octia‚Äôs home and help her complete the goal she‚Äôs had tunnel vision over for the last month‚Äì Reviving her girlfriend! ‚ÄúI can't seriously be blamed for this...‚Äù

Use any means to save her. Cleaning supplies, demonic rituals, unethical medical practices that lead to terrible consequences? No problem! ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt worry, it‚Äôll be okay in the end.‚Äù

Just make sure to keep her sanity in line. Even the smallest of things will cause more stress to her, and it won't look good if it gets too high. "I can't be left behind..."

Octia has one goal, so help her no matter what. "This time it'll work for sure..."

name: Pikmin 216
description: A challenging mod for Pikmin 2 by Teddiursayoshi.

name: M64 MKDD Extended
description: Mario Kart Double Dash: Extended is a Mod for Mario Kart Double Dash. It adds 16 new retro tracks, new karts, 4 Player Grand Prix and a 200cc Mode.

name: Closing doors
description: The elevator stops, even though this isn't your floor.

name: Skibidi Toilets
description: Start the Skibidi Toilet battle and claim as much territory as you can with your toilet. Beware of the other Skibidi Toilets as they have their own territories and are able to break your toilet in a direct collision or just roll across your wet trail.

name: Planet X16
description: Planet X16 the spiritual successor to the Planet X3 strategy game. You are up against the Protoids again. You need to mine resources, build infrastructure and build offensive units to defeat them. All while protecting your bases now with mouse controls

name: Hoshi no Natchan
description: This is a pixel art 2D action game. Use dash, jump and attack to reach the goal. There are no complicated operations or material collection, so you can start playing right away. It's an easy and kindness game.

name: Days Like A Nightmare
description: Who is infected with the parasite 'Rubyuk'? Place sensors, observe the readings, and build your deductions. Then confront the nightmare - mostly in a physical manner. This is a short, scary game that combines reasoning with mini-action.

name: Revvver
description: Create a path by reversing the desired area.

name: The Snow Queen is Uncool
description: It's winter solstice, and Berta should be out there doing her job as an arbiter of mortals, but she prefers to laze around at home instead. This terrible character flaw has almost led to her disappearing from humanity's radar! On her own, she'll have no idea how to fix this... Thankfully, her loyal, brilliant, enterprising and very humble manager knows just the way to save her from obscurity.

name: Enter: The Grinch
description:
The Grinch seeks to steal Christmas from Arlia Village - a locale from a JRPG called Star Ocean 2! This has homages to other IP's such as Doom, as well - so you could say it's a four-in-one crossover (even a five-in-one)!

Anyway, as Ranger comes to think of it - the Grinch looks kinda like an Archvile. And seeing that he's up to no good, it's time to put a stop to his evil plans - whatever that entails!

name: Really Dog: DLC
description: Really Dog's DLC. It unlocks 3 contents: Paku Mode, Mini Mode, and the Endless Level.

name: Ski Simulator: Winter Sports
description: In "Ski Simulator: Winter Sports," players are on a quest to earn points and unlock new levels by mastering the art of skiing or snowboarding. Navigate through the exhilarating slopes, collecting checkpoints along the way to progress further in the game. But beware, time is of the essence ‚Äì the clock is ticking, and every second counts!

name: Golf Escape
description: In this 2D platformer with golf controls, you must aim, charge, then launch yourself around a dangerous abandoned power plant in order to save the worms!

name: Raising the Bar: Salvation
description: Salvation sees the player take control of Grigori immediately after bidding Gordon farewell following the quarry holdout. Whilst his journey continues forwards, Grigori must now work backwards in an effort to not only leave Ravenholm behind, but cleanse it such that no parasites remain. You'll tread familiar ground made unfamiliar by the effects of Gordon's path through the town, combined with the riled-up zombie hordes out in full force, and new pathways Grigori will take to complete his exodus. Pyres will deliver some of Grigori's once-friends to a better place, and also play their part in igniting a flame that will sweep through Ravenholm. By the time you've reached the end of the mod, the entire town will be up in flames and scorched by your actions.

name: Hamster Hunter
description: You come home for an annual family reunion, only to find your family missing with an eerie note left by your father. After you discover what has happened you seek revenge!

name: Mochi Jump
description: 3D action game with simple WASD controls. Soft looking bouncing action with hard difficulty! The rules are simple, just keep it edible and reach the goal. Aim for the goal by making the most of bounces to become a tasty rice cake!

name: CandyVenture: Rebaked
description: Berry and his friends count on you! Evil monsters invaded the candy world and stole all the candies. But you and our heroes are here to save their candy world! Use their powers to destroy the monsters in this cozy 2D adventure game!

name: Pok√©mon Dark Worship
description: A Fire Red Hack with a New Region, New Story, Mega Evolution, Z Moves, Dynamax/Gigantamax, YouTubers as NPCs & Much More!
